p: Dam BW at entry to the farrowing house and at weaning was lower ( p < 0.001) in primiparous compared to multiparous sows (entry: 193.9 ± 1.8 vs. 281.5 ± 1.8 kg, respectively; weaning: 180.5 ± 1.9 vs. 256.6 ± 1.9 kg, respectively) and primiparous sows lost less ( p < 0.001) BW from entry to weaning compared to multiparous sows ( Table 4).
